long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Responsive Joomla templates at Templatestore.com are designed by professional web designers and developed to offer you an easy and fast way to have a professional website up in no time using one of our website templates for it. Joomla is one of the most popular content management systems that offers an excellent opportunity for affordable web design. Search and select the perfect template for your personal or business project from our portfolio of Joomla templates. Download our free app for Joomla templates and responsive web design. Read the latest news, reviews, tips and tricks in our blog and learn from the video tutorials inside our application.

Our offer covers a perfect template for almost any kind of business and always for a competitive price at TemplateStore.com. Get a professional mobile ready responsive joomla template to serve your visitors from all mobile devices and get more traffic and better search engine positioning and results using a fully responsive web design for your website.

Responsive Web Design:
What makes responsive design so great with our Joomla Templates?. Your website will adjust to all mobile devices and different screen resolutions offering a fantastic user experience. All slider and other components are made fully responsive to offer a perfect UX. Do not forget the SEO advantage as your visitors and customers are visiting the same Joomla website not several version of it and this is a very big plus in search engine optimization and results that you will get from it.

Extensions in the Theme:
Our Responsive Joomla Themes come with social sharing buttons and counters, advanced Newsflash module, Google Maps plugin, Image Swoop slider, carousels, tabs etc.. With the theme you will get all the tools to create a functional website that will keep your visitors and clients coming back.

Advanced Navigation:
Our themes come with a responsive menu with unlimited multilevel dropdown to offer a better usability for your website. You can also select from various dropdown animations.

Commenting System:
Joomla 3 themes come with Komento a great full featured commenting system that offers rating and voting options.

Large Amount of Module Positions:
Our Responsive Joomla Themes come with 14 module position rows that allow to choose over 80 module positions on your website. You can choose the way of how to arrange your modules as you need creating a layout that fits your design.

Animated Portfolio with Filtering:
You can filter in your portfolio the way that it allows the customers to apply filters by categories. Various CSS3 hover animation effects are also included for your portfolio.

Easy Installation:
Joomla Themes are delivered with a full package installation archive that will make it easier for you to in several simple steps.

Create Custom Type Pages:
The theme comes with two custom page types added to Cherry Framework: category Blog and Gallery View. It will be easy to create gallery and blog layouts just selecting the correct page type in the menu manager. Changes in layouts will not affect other Joomla pages on your website.
